name: Glow Wheels
description:
Exciting music racing for free!

Drive the neon city in an exciting beat.
Is fuel down?
Do not worry. Get the cube that appears along the beat and fill up the scarce fuel.
When the fuel runs out, the drive ends.

music racing top game
beat racing game for free

[How to play]
1. Move to left and right slides.
2. Get the cube.
3. Avoid "dangerous obstacles".
4. Enjoy your music.

[Game Features]
- Free racing!
- Exciting background music!
- Simple operation!
- SF background graphic!
